title: Cancel a Course Due to Low Enrollment
description: A department needs to cancel a course for the upcoming semester because not enough students registered.

tasks.description: Identify the course and verify its current enrollment number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that 'ART450' has only 2 students enrolled, below the minimum of 8.

tasks.description: Process the course cancellation in the SIS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully cancels the course section.

tasks.description: Trigger automated notifications to the enrolled students and the assigned instructor, advising them of the cancellation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent ensures all affected parties are notified.
